about_the_game:
You are the governor of a new island. Build and manage your own colony.
This is a fantasy city-building strategy game with focus on production chains and settlers desires.


Citizens are primary resource.
Gather and process resources and maintain the needs of your colonists.
To keep them happy, you can provide them with luxuries, variant foods, medicines, services, and more.
Can you lead the city without citizens being unhappy and sick?


Establish numerous production chains, and use adjacency bonus for more prosperity.
You can get resources by simple processing at first.
But you'll need to build complex production chains to get advanced resources.
The island is small, and there are obstacles and useful natural objects.
Use the space efficiently!


Research technologies, and unlock new knowledge and resources.
You can develop freely your city with 25 types of research and 54 types of buildings.
